channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Dashboard View Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Dashboard View Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-27197|2024-08-03T05:25:32.462Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20dashboard%20view%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Dashboard View Plugin 2.18 and earlier does not perform URL validation for the Iframe Portlet's Iframe source URL, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure views.
